Rehgar.name: Chain Heal
Rehgar.description: Heal an ally for 250 (+4% per level) Health, then heal up to two other nearby allies for 250 (+4% per level) Health each.

Rehgar.name: Lightning Shield
Rehgar.description: Imbue an ally with lightning dealing 70 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies.  Lasts 5 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Earthbind Totem
Rehgar.description: Create a totem that slows nearby enemies by 35%.  The totem has 217 (+4% per level) Health and lasts for 8 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Bloodlust
Rehgar.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed, and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

Rehgar.name: Ancestral Healing
Rehgar.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1552 (+4% per level) Health.  Cannot be used on yourself.

Rehgar.name: Ghost Wolf
Rehgar.description: Instead of using a mount, you transform into a Ghost Wolf with 20% increased Movement Speed. Basic Attacks in Ghost Wolf form cause you to lunge at your target and deal 75% bonus damage. Dealing damage, using Abilities, and channeling cancels Ghost Wolf form.

1.name: Colossal Totem
1.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50%.

1.name: Electric Charge
1.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%.

1.name: Lightning Bond
1.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on you.

1.name: Wolf Run
1.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%.

4.name: Feral Heart
4.description: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.

4.name: Healing Totem
4.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allies in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

4.name: Spiritwalker's Grace
4.description: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 65 to 45.

4.name: Stormcaller
4.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 40.

7.name: Blood and Thunder
7.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

7.name: Cleanse
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

7.name: Farsight
7.description: Activate to reveal an area for 10 seconds.  Enemies in the area are revealed for 4 seconds.

7.name: Totemic Projection
7.description: Increases Earthbind Totem's duration from 8 to 12 seconds, and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

10.name: Ancestral Healing
10.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1552 (+4% per level) Health.  Cannot be used on yourself.

10.name: Bloodlust
10.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Earth Shield
13.description: Lightning Shield gives a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

13.name: Earthliving Enchant
13.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 200 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

13.name: Tidal Waves
13.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 1 second for each Hero healed.

16.name: Earthgrasp Totem
16.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

16.name: Hunger of the Wolf
16.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal you for 5% of your maximum Health.

16.name: Rising Storm
16.description: Every time Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase that Lightning Shield's damage by 10%. Stacks up to 20 times.

20.name: Farseer's Blessing
20.description: Increases healing amount by 50%. Allies near the target are healed for 50% of the amount of health regained.

20.name: Gladiator's War Shout
20.description: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
